com.modthemod.api.mod
Interface Mod

All Known Implementing Classes:
JavaMod
public interface Mod

Represents a mod.

Method Summary
 ModDescription getDescription()
          Gets the ModDescription of this mod.
 Logger getLogger()
          Gets the Logger for this mod.
 ModLoader<?> getModLoader()
          Gets the ModLoader that loaded this mod.
 String getName()
          Gets the name of this Mod.
 boolean isEnabled()
          Returns true if the Mod is enabled.
 void onDisable()
          Called when the mod is disabled.
 void onEnable()
          Called when the mod is enabled.
 void onLoad()
          Called when the mod is loaded.
